name: Last Barrier
description:
Under your command is a military base in the desert, which, as a result of an out-of-control virus epidemic, is approaching hordes of hungry zombies. The battle will be taken by several armored vehicles with machine guns and rocket launchers mounted on the roofs, and the fortified wall should hold back the onslaught of the enemy for some time.

Last Barrier is a tower defense game set in a zombie apocalypse setting. Defend the base with army machine guns, rocket launchers and a wall built around the perimeter. Purchase unit upgrades with kill points. Your military base is the last line of defense against the countless forces of zombies.

- Minimalistic graphics
- Zombie setting
- Real time strategy and tactics
